data.title: Literature Wales
data.meta_description: Lottie Williams is an emerging nature/eco writer from Carmarthenshire.  She is published online and in print, including Nation Cymru and Modron, and has appeared in events including Coracle Europe, Lapidus and TheseThreeStreams.  Lottie is featured in the Rising Stars section, and as a presenter at the Seren Poetry Festival, on the YouTube channel JustAnotherPoet.  She … Continued
data.text: “I am so grateful and energised to have been chosen for this amazing opportunity as I know firsthand the positive impact that writing for wellbeing has had on my life, and I want to be able to gift forward what I have been gifted. Knowing how literacy has the capacity to uplift, invigorate and inspire, I am excited to learn how to create and then implement a safe space in which participants can write in order to explore feelings and improve wellbeing. I believe it is so important to be able to find – and use – your voice.”
